description: Try our easy to follow Angel Hair Spaghetti With Pesto And Prawns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Angel Hair Spaghetti With Pesto And Prawns
name: Angel Hair Spaghetti With Pesto And Prawns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in boiling, salted water as per packet instructions. Drain pasta, reserving 1/4 cup of the cooking water. Add extra oil, prawns, pesto and lemon juice to pasta with enough of the cooking water to thin it out a little. Serve immediately, topped with reserved basil.
